+import thingsboardApiQueue from '../api/queue.service';
+import queueTypeList from "../queue/queue-type-list.directive.js";
+
+export default angular.module('thingsboard.queue', [
+    thingsboardApiQueue
+])
+    .directive('tbQueueTypeList', queueTypeList)
+    .name;
